content: What a trip! Managed to score a sweet deal on airfare to London, and we saved on hotel costs by booking an AirBnb. If you're having trouble with London budgeting, let me know and I can help you out!
Trip of a lifetime to Tokyo! Anime waifus everywhere~ UwU
WHEN DID HABS JERSEYS GET SO EXPENSIVE?! Downside of a cup run :( Broke my budget :(
Not worth it! Paris is terrible, actually :(

Pretty proud of myself for keeping it under $1000 to spend a weekend in the 6. Sick times at the Opera House and a sweet AirBnb that had free parking. My biggest purchases were concert beer and a tank of gas!
